What kind of Player shuld a person use to play Blueray material in computer?

Definitely a Blu-Ray player unless you have at least a dual core with a high end video card and of course all the proper codecs, (i recommend Klite mega codec pack), PS3 has been workin great for me just use a program like mkv2vob to transcode DTS if you dont have a DTS soundsystem (I use AC3)  and split it into 4 GB files cuz of good ol FAT32 lol.
